author: s1na
content:
Requesting feedback on this proposal to deprecate the "pending" block tag. TL;DR, we'd like to avoid building pending state. Idea is to default to "latest" (assume nothing in mempool) with exception of `eth_getTransactionCount` (even that is questionable) which will return latest nonce in mempool.
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/495
